extendedInfo.description: This is the companion application to 'Sixaxis Controller' and allows you to check whether your phone is compatible with the Sixaxis and DualShock 3 controllers before purchasing the full application from the Android market.*** IMPORTANT ***- ROOT access is required!!!- Due to the way pairing is done with the controllers, you need to manually pair your controller with the PC utility 'SixaxisPairTool' (available on the website) and a mini-USB cable. Android 3.1+ users can also pair directly on their devices via USB.- It is highly recommended that you use an ORIGINAL controller. Many after market controllers will not work. If you get a 'Client connected: 1' message, but the lights on your controller continue to flash, it is almost certainly not an original Sony controller.- The fake controllers that are most likely to work (though not guaranteed) are those made by Gasia. If you bought a fake that works but isn't made by Gasia, I'd love to hear from you so I can compile a list of known working controllers.- Be sure to read the instructions in the help menu carefully.This product is not affiliated with, nor authorized, endorsed or licensed in any way by Sony Corporation, its affiliates or subsidiaries. All trademarks are property of their respective holders.For assistance, full instructions and FAQ, visit our website at http://www.dancingpixelstudios.com

reviews.title: Does what it\'s supposed to.
reviews.comment: Checked and found that my device it\'s compatible.  Reading the reviews on this app is a laugh though, too many morons putting 1 star because their device isn\'t supported yet.

reviews.title: Scam
reviews.comment: It is kind of a scam. HD screen devices are not supported fully but still works (GS4) and they dont mention it. The devs are not supporting this app anymore and you cant contact them... looks like a scam, Sounds like a scam. Smells like a scam... its a scam!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: YOU ARE ALL IDIOTS
reviews.comment: First things first if you are not rooted your not compatible. And if your still not compatible change your ROM and your kernel. When you check for compatibility superuser will pop up and ask if you want this app to do its thing. Ounce you allow it your compatible
